Mountain),Renmin xiju(People's drama),1976,3 (July),70-73.Hong Xi

open up anewstorm inpoetrywriting:delightatreadingSelectedPoemsof
Xiaojinzhuang),Beijingdaxuexuebao(shehuikexueban),I975,2(March),

Yuebing,‘Hongdeng gao ju”(Mounting Red Lantern’), Shandong wenyi
(Shandong literature and art), 1974,6 (December), 55-57.
